Class ChatChannel

    • robot.ChatChannel

extends java.lang.Object

    Romain LAFON

        Say if a robot is already on the given summit
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • takePlace

                      IEdge oldEdge,
                      IEdge nextEdge)
        Indicate that a robot is now on the given summit going to the given next edge
        Parameters:
        newSummit: - the summit where the robot had just been inserted
        oldEdge: - the robot old position
        nextEdge: - the robot next position
